          <title>
            <string language="en">Daylight in summer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tageslicht am Sommer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jour en été</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz do dia no verão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce del giorno di estate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως της ημέρας το καλοκαίρι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hora solar en verano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration explains why daylight is longer in UK in summer.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung erklärt, warum Tageslicht in 
Großbritannien am Sommer länger ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration explique pourquoi le jour est 
plus long au R-U en été.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração explica porque a luz do dia é 
mais longa no Reino Unido no verão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione spiega perchè la luce del 
giorno è più lunga nel Regno Unito di estate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εξηγεί γιατί το φως της ημέρας 
είναι πιό μακροχρόνιο στο UK το καλοκαίρι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración explica porqué la hora solar es
más larga en Reino Unido en verano.</string>
          </description>
